entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is a model pupil who had never set foot in that particular place. He is mentioned as someone who knows a secret with Voldemort that Dumbledore has not discovered.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who had strayed oï¬€ the beaten track in his time at school. He knows a secret with Voldemort that Dumbledore has not discovered.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is someone who shares a secret with Harry that Dumbledore has not discovered.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who does not know a certain secret shared by Harry and Voldemort.

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is a teacher at Hogwarts who rouses Harry from his sleep to inform him about the situation.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student at Hogwarts who is wearing earmuffs and carrying potted plants. He informs Harry that they are going to lob mandrakes over the walls.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts who gallops behind Harry.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's dog that gallops behind Harry.

entities.name: mandrakes
entities.description: Mandrakes are plants being carried by Neville and others to be lobbed over the walls.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort share a secret that Dumbledore has not discovered.
Dumbledore does not know the secret shared by Harry and Voldemort.
Neville is carrying mandrakes to be lobbed over the walls.
